userEmail.description: The email address of the user whose calendar to read. If not provided, uses the default user email from environment

startDate.description: Starting date to read calendar from in ISO 8601 format (e.g., '2025-11-24T00:00:00Z'). Defaults to today if not provided

endDate.description: Ending date to read calendar until in ISO 8601 format (e.g., '2025-12-01T00:00:00Z'). If not provided, uses 'days' parameter

days.description: Number of days to read ahead from start date. Defaults to 7 days if endDate is not provided
